name: Sprogger
description:
Sprogg is cast into space by a commercial space rocket fleeing Earth. This frog must hop through an obstacle course of space debris to find refuge on Planet Sprogger. However, Sprogg must be careful as each platform can only withstand one jump.

Sprogger was created as part of Games Jobs Live's Game Parade with the theme "one-time use". Ewan Pandelus is responsible for programming and Innes White for art. If you would like to learn more about the development process head over to Innes's dev-log.

Notes
All visual content was created by Innes using Unity, Maya and Substance Suite.

All scripts were written by Ewan, with the excepetion of:

Most of the sounds were recorded and edited by Ewan and Innes with the exception of :

"Wind, Realistic, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

Music used-> track "Trinity Alps" by artist "Podington Bear" of freemusicarchive.org

Power bar sound -> "Increase01.wav" from michael_kur95 of Freesound.org
